xal.extension.widgets.swing

Class DoubleInputTextField

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
            • javax.swing.JTextField
              • xal.extension.widgets.swing.DoubleInputTextField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class DoubleInputTextField
extends javax.swing.JTextField
    This is an input formatted text field for a double value. This text field will have the special alert background color is the changes are not committed. After posting changes the background color will be normal color again. In addition to usual JTextField methods it provides getValue() and setValue(double val) methods to get and to set double value to this container. User has to add one or several ActionListeners as usual to interact with the external code. By default the format of this text field is ###.###. To specify another format the method setDecimalFormat should be used.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
